entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who travels on the Hogwarts Express without Ron. He is also mentioned to be picking up Hedwig's cage and his trunk.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone Harry usually travels with on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as telling Harry to hurry up so they can save places.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage is mentioned as something Harry picks up.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is described as a fellow fifth-year Gryffindor and someone Harry meets in the last carriage.

relationships.description: Harry travels on the Hogwarts Express with Ron.
Harry owns Hedwig, as evidenced by him picking up her cage.
Harry meets Neville Longbottom in the last carriage of the Hogwarts Express.
